features: ‚úàÔ∏è POWERS 4 DEVICES AT ONCE ‚Äì This compact and lightweight 10A US Type B grounded travel adapter charges and powers up to 4 devices simultaneously. It works with most electrical outlets in over 20 countries, including commonly visited countries such as the USA, Canada, Colombia, and Thailand.

üîå POWERFUL OUTLET + USB & USB-C PORTS: Comes with a powerful 10A AC outlet & 3 smart USB ports (2 x USB, 1 x USB-C), which will charge your devices up to 70% faster than a standard charger. Supports broad input range (100-250V) for international voltage requirements. Note: MyTravelPal does not convert voltage.

‚ö° A SAFE TRAVEL ADAPTER, SUITABLE FOR HIGH POWERED DEVICES ‚Äì One of the very few travel adapters that passes the very strict regulatory standard BS:8546. This MyTravelPal adapter has surge protection and a ground / earth connection; essential safety features for many electrical appliances, meaning you can use this adapter with high powered electricals such as computers, curling tongs, hair dryers, laptops, phones, etc without worry!

‚úîÔ∏è BUILT TO LAST ‚Äì Unlike others available on the market, our adaptors are made with high quality, durable materials that don‚Äôt overheat, provide good insultation, and are flame retardant. Travel with peace of mind!
description: Product Description FEATURES 4-in-1 USA Travel Adapter (Type B) This travel adapter allows you to power up to 4 devices simultaneously via its AC outlet and 3 USB ports (2 x USB-A, 1 x USB-C)... you'll never have to fight over who uses the charger again - there are enough ports for everyone! You can use your travel adapter with any socket that is Type B , which is most commonly found throughout USA, Canada and Mexico and more (see below for full list.) 3 Smart USB Charging Ports (USB-A & USB-C) Featuring 3 x High Powered USB Ports (2 x USB-A, 1 x USB-C), MyTravelPal's Smart Charging Ports are able to charge your devices up to 70% faster than standard adapters available elsewhere. The 2 x USB-A ports and 1 x USB-C port (5V / 2.4A Total) are suitable for powering most gadgets such as phones, tablets, headphones etc. PLEASE NOTE: The USB-C port does NOT support powering Macbook, Macbook Air, Macbook Pro or any other device which needs 14~22V charging voltage. Safe For High Powered Devices With a powerful 10A AC Outlet and a ground connection , you can use MyTravelPal with high earth powered devices such as games consoles, hair dryers, curling irons, and laptops, as well as mobile phones, cameras and tablets etc. MyTravelPal is one of the very few travel adaptors that passes stringent British Safety standards (BS8546:2016), as well as many others, and as such, is one of the safest adaptors on the market. Please note that MyTravelPal is not a power converter. List of Compatible Countries (Type B) The following countries have Type B plug sockets, so you should be able to use this adapter when you travel there: American Samoa, Anguilla, Antigua and Barbuda, Aruba, Bahamas, Barbados, Belize, Bermuda, Bolivia, British Virgin Islands, Cambodia, Canada , Cayman Islands, China, Colombia , Costa Rica, Cuba , Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guam, Guatemala, Guyana, Haiti, Honduras, Jamaica , Korea, Laos, Lebanon, Liberia, Malaysia, Maldives, Mexico , Micronesia Federated States of, Montserrat, Netherlands Antilles, Nicaragua, Panama, Peru , Philippines, Puerto Rico, Saint Kitts and Nevis, SaintVincent and the Grenadines, Taiwan, Thailand , Trinidad and Tobago, Turks and Caicos Islands, United States of America (USA) , Virgin Islands, Venezuela, Vietnam , Yemen Meet MyTravelPal's Founder! Based in London, UK Hey there - I'm Steph, the creator of MyTravelPal; a small UK based company that sells award winning travel adapters of all types. I created MyTravelPal because I could never find a suitable range of adapters that were small and powerful, but above all... safe and built to last! I really hope you love MyTravelPal as much as I do - thanks for visiting! MyTravelPal was featured in EasyJet Traveller's "Travel Essentials" list in 2021, T3 Gadget Magazine's "Top Travel Adapter 2022" list, as well as Tech Advisor's "Best Travel Adapter" list in 2022 Product Specifications Input Voltage: 100V-250V AC, 50/60Hz Max. Power Rating: 2500W (250V~ 10A) USB-A and USB-C Ports: 5V / 2.4A Max (2.4A Total) Dimensions: 7.0 x 5.0 x 6.8 cm Weight: 103g This is not a voltage converter UK to USA With USB & USB-C 2 Way UK to USA With USB & USB-C World & USA To Europe With USB Worldwide Adapter With USB Worldwide Adapter With USB & USB-C 2 Way UK to USA With USB Add To Basket Add To Basket Buying Options Buying Options Add To Basket Buying Options Customer Reviews 4.6 out of 5 stars 475 4.7 out of 5 stars 200 4.6 out of 5 stars 475 4.6 out of 5 stars 1,480 4.6 out of 5 stars 1,480 4.7 out of 5 stars 200 Price ¬£12.99 ¬£ 12 . 99 ¬£15.99 ¬£ 15 . 99 ‚Äî no data ‚Äî no data ¬£26.92 ¬£ 26 . 92 ‚Äî no data Compatible Countries ~20 Countries (US, Canada, Mexico etc) ~20 Countries (US, Canada, Mexico etc) ~20 Countries (US, Canada, Mexico etc) 150+ Countries Worldwide 150+ Countries Worldwide ~20 Countries (US, Canada, Mexico etc) Accepted Plug Types UK Only UK Only World (EU, US, UK, AUS etc) World (EU, US, UK, AUS etc) World (EU, US, UK, AUS etc) UK Only AC Outlets 1 2 1 1 1 2 USB-A Ports ‚úì ‚úì ‚úì ‚úì ‚úì ‚úì USB-C Ports ‚úì ‚úì no data no data ‚úì no data Simultaneous Charging 4 Devices 5 Devices 4 Devices 4 Devices 4 Devices 5 Devices
